title: Correction: Retinal Ganglion Cells Can Rapidly Change Polarity from Off to On
fullText:
In PLoS Biology, volume 5, issue 3: doi: 10.1371/journal.pbio.0050065

In Figure 5A, the sequence of the subpanels was inadvertently inverted. The correct Figure 5 is shown here.
